name: Still Intact 5
description:
What is about?

Welcome back to Oasis-17 in some part of the desert, far awar from Dreams, Hotwaters, Village, Twisted, Forest and the mountains of the big three, us characters search a way to return safe to their home.

The team gf later of back to his world find your home something changed

Features of Still Intact:

-Only 1 Ending

-Average Duration: 20 minutes to 1 hours

-You can use a gamepad for two Players Mode

Controls:

- L to jump

- P to dash

- K to shoot bullets

- A to move left

- S to move down

- D to move right

- i to next dialogue or interact

- U to skip dialogues (experimental)

- O to enter in the EX-Mode

2 second player control:

-Cross to jump

-Square to atack

-Circle to dash

-Triangle for interact or next dialogue

- L1 to skip dialogue

- R1 to enter in the EX-Mode

Supported languages: Only English

I hope you enjoy
